Description:
Sleek & Sophisticated in Beautiful Strathfieldsaye!
This sleek 4 bedroom family home has been designed with both style and practicality in mind. Offering several open living areas where all of the family can enjoy their own time, in their own space. On entering the home you're welcomed by the tasteful tones of quality which is displayed throughout. Fixtures, fittings, floor coverings and window furnishings all compliment this well-built home. A formal style lounge or living area would be the perfect place for parents to relax with a movie or book. The North wing accommodates children or guests with 3 adjoining bedrooms with BIR's, bathroom, toilet, laundry and a private space for reading, study, music or maybe a multipurpose room that everyone can use. With a smart design, the kitchen/dining area creates a feeling of openness whilst still compact and practical. Offering all modern conveniences that a busy family require; dishwasher, oven, walk-in pantry- with the added style of tiled splashbacks and plenty of bench space, this space really combines both aspects very well, creating real modern-day living. Step outside through the sliding doors to a magnificent decked alfresco entertaining area. With the added bonus of side-access ideal for the caravan, truck & trailer. In a tree-lined street of beautiful homes on the outskirts of Bendigo, within minutes of schools, supermarkets, medical services, sporting facilities and dining, Strathfieldsaye is the perfect place for you and your family to make a new start today!
Property Features:
- Ensuite with spa bath
- Side Access
- Dishwasher & Large Pantry
- Ducted Heating & Cooling
- Rumpus Room
- Double lock-up garage
- Outdoor Entertaining
- Land Size 1000 m2 (approx.)
- 4m x 5m Shed

Description:
Eppalock Run Farmlets
Eppalock Run Farmlets
Stage 1 sold out.
Stage 2 now selling - ALL CURRENTLY UNDER OFFER.
Eppalock Farmlets are surrounded by the stunning Lyell State Forest and feature rolling undulating terrain with some magnificent stands of native trees.
These pristine lots boast generous size building envelopes with stunning views of the surrounding countryside.
With traditional homestead style timber gates and maintenance-free post and rail side entrance feature fencing to each lot, your options are endless to build your idyllic new home and take advantage of the views and lifestyle the Lake Eppalock region has to offer.
This picturesque, tranquil location has the advantage of being just a 4-minute drive to Lake Eppalock, perfect for summer water activities with the family. With the added convenience of only being a short 14km drive to Strathfieldsaye. Ideal for frequent flyers with Melbourne Airport only 1.25 hours away, you really can have it all.
Lot 1 - 8.570ha (approx) - UNDER OFFER
Lot 2 - 8.119ha (approx) - UNDER OFFER
Lot 3 - 8.029ha (approx) - UNDER OFFER
Lot 4 - 8.017ha (approx) - UNDER OFFER
Lot 5 - 7.362ha (approx) - UNDER OFFER
Features include:
-Rural farmlet adjacent to scenic Lyell State Forest
-Lots 3 & 4 have a dam on the property
-Short drive to local schools and shopping centre
-Power to boundary
-Fully fenced
-New fencing
-Land Capability Report
-Bushfire Report
-Soil test
Take this opportunity and build your family's dream home on scenic acreage. Enquiries and questions welcomed.

Description:
Investors - Developers - Opportunity of a Life Time!
This well held complex sits right in the middle of one of Bendigos most desired investment locations. The property sits on the doorstep of Bendigo South East College and Bendigos Latrobe University. Featuring 5 x1 bedroom units, all with built in robes, open plan kitchen/living, laundry, bathroom, private rear yards and carport. Situated on a large 1200m2 approx allotment, consider further development of the site (STCA). Strong occupancy has always been the case with this complex and there is further opportunity to improve the yield. If youre a serious investor/developer then check this one out!

Description:
Quality, Comfort & Space.
When you won't compromise on space, quality or comfort, this home is for you.
An incredible offering here with this 5 bedroom expansive family home. Rarely seen, all 5 bedrooms feature their own walk-in robes, master with its own ensuite with double shower and floor to ceiling tile.
This four-year-old Paul Gray home will surely impress with quality at every turn. 3 living spaces, for kids retreat, home cinema or sitting room (for some peace and quiet).
The second living zone is joined by the open plan meals, kitchen & living.
Again we see the mark of quality with textured tiles and stone benchtops, dual ovens & 6 burner gas cooktop. Entertainers will love the alfresco dining area and 3rd large living zone on the northern aspect of the house.
The main bathroom features a separate toilet, while the laundry has its own storeroom for mess-free living!
Side access is available to the large double remote garage. While the low maintenance garden means more time enjoying your new home.

Description:
UNDER CONTRACT
This solid, 3 bedroom home sits on a generous 806m2 (approx) allotment & would suit both owner occupiers & investors alike. It offers amazing potential for renovation &/or extension. Original features include high ceilings, decorative cornices & glass etched doors. Step from the front patio into the spacious entry & through to the lounge. This light filled room contains a gas heater & flows through to the dining room. The kitchen provides ample built in cupboards as well as room for a second dining table. All 3 bedrooms are spacious & contain built in robes, whilst the updated family bathroom has a bath, shower & vanity. A separate toilet is off the laundry. Outside you will find an under cover entertaining space, a large & secure yard, a garden shed, carport & a single garage with concrete floor & power as well additional storage space. Close to all amenities, including The Bendigo Club, child care, schools, shops & transport as well as parklands, sporting facilities & walking tracks, this property has so much to offer.

Description:
HOME SWEET HOME
Move-in, recline and relax there's nothing to be done here. The current owners have meticulously refreshed and renovated their home to perfection.
It sits behind a secure white picket fence with low maintenance garden beds and big front lawns for family fun and games.
The newly renovated home includes a spacious lounge with polished hardwood floors adjoining the new kitchen and ample meals area. The kitchen is equipped with stainless steel gas/electric cooking, integrated dishwasher, roll-out pantry and a handy appliance cupboard to help keep the benches uncluttered. An island bench separates the kitchen from the meals area and doubles as a breakfast bar while french doors open to a timber deck and a charming alfresco area. It's easy to envisage a long table spread for family dinners under the rambling grapevine and spreading canopy of a large tree decked with twinkling fairy lights.
Three bedrooms are grouped around the upgraded bathroom boasting 1200mm shower, bath, timber-topped vanity and WC while a versatile room off the kitchen makes a great rumpus or second living/theatre room. It's flooded with northern light and basks in winter sunshine courtesy of big windows overlooking the rear garden.
Notable extras are laundry storage, powder room, ducted heating/cooling, high-span double carport with gates to the secure backyard and garden shed.
Located in a quiet, family-friendly neighbourhood handy to schools, childcare, shops, Strathdale Community Park and public transport, this impeccably presented home oozes homely character, warmth and personal style. It's practical and perfect for a young family, first home buyer or an ideal place for retirees to rest up between trips.

Description:
Once in a life time opportunity! 13.7 acres lifestyle property only minutes to the CBD
- Yes, definitely a once in a life time opportunity to secure 13.7 acres close to the CBD
- Extremely picturesque property on 13.7 acres with two dams and, 2 Meg water right
- One of the largest acreage properties available in such close proximity to the CBD areas of both Bendigo and Eaglehawk. Town water, power, septic all connected and natural gas at the front boundary.
- Extremely well maintained family home in excellent condition plus workshop/garaging
- Opportunity to land bank the property for the future or simply enjoy the lifestyle that the property offers. Garaging undercover for 5 vehicles.
- Established tennis court, ample room for additional shedding, cleared acreage for the ponies etc
- Walk to Neangar Golf Course, Eaglehawk lakes, Whipstick forest and regional park
- Modern updated kitchen with dishwasher, pantry and electric cooking
- Ducted refrigerated cooling and heating zoned to three areas for all seasons
- Services connected are power, town water & septic system. Natural gas is at the boundary
- Call Gavin on 0427 887 766 for an inspection any time Monday to Sunday
As the agent with the privilege of selling this beautiful lifestyle acreage property I can say it is one of the nicest areas in Eaglehawk and Bendigo if you desire to live within minutes of the CBD. One of the few remaining acreage properties so close to town. There is a possibility that the COGB may re-assess the property at some future time for rezoning making it a good land bank property. You would need to talk with Council and undertake your own due diligence in regards to any potential rezoning (currently zoned farming).
This information has been provided to us by third parties and we do not accept any responsibility for its accuracy. You should make your own enquiries and check the information so as to determine whether or not this information is in fact accurate. You must make your own assessment and obtain professional advice if necessary.

Description:
Your Rural Escape
Virtual Tour available by clicking link
If you have been looking for that tree change property, then we have it here. Located back from the road this brick home is positioned to take in the peaceful semi cleared native block. From the impressive outdoor entertaining deck, you take in the beautiful dam. With bird life and native surrounds this will become your favourite place.
With timber look flooring and large windows the house takes in views of the surrounding property. The four-bedroom home has 2 large living areas with both solid fuel heating, gas heating and reverse cycle air conditioning. The kitchen is at the back of the home overlooking the entertainer deck and the views of the dam and beyond.
The main bedroom has reverse cycle air conditioning built in robes and ensuite. The remaining three bedrooms all have built in robes. These bedrooms are all serviced by the main bathroom with separate toilet.
Outside you will find a new American style barn with concrete floor and tanks. There is also a second smaller shed. The property is fenced into 3 paddocks that are a mixture of cleared and native bush land. There are 2 dams on the block with a 1 meg water right that feeds into the larger dam.
Inside Features:
Four bedrooms
Main bedroom with ensuite and built in robes
Built in robes to remaining bedrooms
Solid fuel and gas heating
Split system air-con to rumpus and lounge
Timber look floors throughout
Outside Features:
New American style barn
Second large shed
2 Dams with 1 meg water-right
3 fenced paddocks
Private and quiet location
5.0 Kw Solar Electricity with 24 panels
This fantastic property would be ideal for families or anyone out there wanting some acreage close to town with plenty of space for the horse/pony and motorbike etc. Located close to school bus and a short drive to shops, supermarkets and schools. Approximately 7 km's drive to Kangaroo Flat, 15 km's drive to Bendigo CBD, 1.5 hr drive to Melbourne.
For 360 degree tour, text the word mccombs to 0488 810 392

Description:
DREAMY RESORT-STYLE PARADISE
Like a tropical paradise with endless entertaining appeal, this exceptional family home successfully combines multiple indoor and outdoor living zones creating the ultimate resort lifestyle.
The home's substantial dimensions begin to unfold after passing through the wide entry with a spacious study followed by sitting room/parent's retreat and master bedroom with walk-in-robe/dressing room and ensuite boasting double vanity and oversized shower.
Open and airy north-facing living room, family room and dedicated dining area with indoor/outdoor fluidity surround the central kitchen detailed with Caesarstone benches, 900mm cooking appliances, dishwasher and pantry.
Beyond the living zones you will find three more robed bedrooms, family bathroom, laundry, walk-in linen store, WC and a great multipurpose room. It makes the ideal rumpus/games room or teen retreat and with rear access from the driveway, lends itself for use as a home-operated office/business.
The one-owner home is further enhanced by ducted heating/cooling/vacuum, cosy wood-fire, 9" ceilings, timber-look vinyl plank flooring, walk-in storage and 4.5Kw Solar system with battery storage.
Be prepared for the wow factor when you step into the very private, tropical-inspired backyard. You could be forgiven for thinking you are standing in a Port Douglas resort! Established palm trees and tall bamboo tower over a serene kidney-shaped, solar-heated pool complete with slate paved surrounds and Balinese hut with spa. Holiday at home under the adjoining alfresco pavilion showcasing a sauna room, wood-fired pizza oven, TV, ceiling fans, cafe blinds and natural gas to barbecue.
Park-like landscaping covering the large lot approx 2679m² is maintained for very little cost by a fully automatic sprinkler system under bore water supply and 3 rainwater tanks while walking paths on two sides take you safely all the way to Strathfieldsaye shops, schools etc.
Must be seen to be appreciated!
Internal area
32m²

Description:
Contemporary Family Home on 1024m2
Backing onto a bush reserve, this spacious family home situated on 1024m2 has a floor plan to suit a variety of buyers.
Comprising 3 bedrooms, master with walk-in robe and spacious ensuite with spa bath, while the two other bedrooms have built-in robes.
Good size separate living spaces include a formal lounge at the front plus spacious multipurpose room at the rear.
The central hub of the home is the fabulous open-plan kitchen/meals area with loads of natural light and sliding doors to access the north facing alfresco.
The kitchen is well-appointed with stainless steel appliances including a 900mm stove, gas cooktop, dishwasher and a roomy fridge space.
Other features include ducted gas heating and evaporative cooling throughout, double carport and a fully-enclosed block with side access to the shed.
Conveniently positioned close to schools, public transport, Neangar Park Golf Course and local shops. Call for an inspection today.

Bushland Aspect & A flexible Floorplan
Quietly set to the rear of this huge block (over 1/4 acre) sits 61 Jobs Gully Road.
With a beautiful aspect looking out across the Jobs Gully Bushland Reserve, and brimming with character, this family home with flexible floorplan if ready for you to make it your own.
Only 5km from the Bendigo CBD with easy access to the borough of Eaglehawk, and walking distance to Eaglehawk Secondary.
The home itself is currently set up as a four-bedroom option with oversized masters suite. The alternative is to use this space as a second separate living zone depending on the needs of your family. Having been recarpeted only days ago, and with ducted heated and cooling throughout, there is nothing to do but move in and enjoy. Yet there is still room to add value and your own style to this wonderful family opportunity.
Contact Briohny without delay as this property will impress.

Description:
LIKE-NEW MODERN & STYLISH FAMILY HOME
*This dwelling is under five years old, has never been sold prior, which means first homeowners may be eligible for the $20,000 plus stamp duty exemption. That's a saving up to $40,000.*
An easy walk to the milk bar, post office, supermarket, hairdressers, café, bus stop and further amenities, this beautifully finished family home is positioned in a quiet court and is also close to the Huntly sports ground, primary school and kindergarten.
A neatly landscaped front garden leads up to the main entry and, indoors, there is a spacious master bedroom at the front of the house. Featuring a large walk-in robe and ensuite with separate toilet, this is a lovely parents retreat. The remaining three bedrooms can be found at the rear of the home, all with built-in robes. This section of the property also features a family bathroom and separate toilet.
Off the main entry is a spacious and light-filled open plan kitchen, living and dining room. With quality appliances, modern black tapware and stone benchtops, this stylish space also offers ample storage including a large walk-in pantry. Towards the childrens wing is a second living space, and off the kitchen is a good-sized laundry with sliding door access to the side of the home.
Glass sliding doors open from the central living area out to a paved alfresco. Perfect for year-round entertaining, this space includes a TV point, power, lights and pull-down blinds. The remainder of the back yard is set to lawn, offering plenty of scope for a buyer to add a veggie garden, shed, play area or pool. Double gates at the side of the house allow genuine vehicle access to the back yard.
Additional features include:
Ducted evaporative cooling and ducted heating
Secure access to the home from double garage
Modern kitchen appliances including 900mm gas stove with five-burner cooktop and dishwasher
Solar gas hot water system
Vehicle access via double gates to the rear yard
This like-new property is perfect for a buyer seeking a quality family home that they can really make their own. Be a part of a great community, just 20 minutes to the centre of Bendigo, in this move-in ready property that is ready to be enjoyed.

Description:
Ready to go with approved plans!
Set on a quiet street, just off the hustle and bustle of Upper California Gully Road sits these two 280m2 (approximately) blocks, ready for the perfect person to come and build a beautiful new home. Each lot is fully serviced and ready to be built on tomorrow!
The property comes with council approved site plans for two amazing units. With fantastic proportions, these plans will not disappoint. Both comprise of 3 sizable bedrooms plus a study, 2 bathrooms including an Ensuite to the master suite, a double garage with ample storage space, open plan living/kitchen/dining area that lead out to an alfresco dining area.
The hard work has been done for you. Built to a high standard, each home can be fully landscaped, tiled hallways and wet area, carpet throughout evaporative heating and cooling and north facing solar panels.
Occupants of these remarkable properties will enjoy a peaceful lifestyle whilst still close to all of California Gully and Eaglehawks amenities including the Eaglehawk township, the improved YMCA gym and pool, Canterbury park, just a short walk from California Gully Primary School and public transport, and a short 5-minute drive to Bendigo's thriving CBD.
Contact us to book your digital inspection with the agent.
(E&OE)

Description:
Fully renovated 3 bedroom home including bungalow and various sheds
This perfectly presented property sure does offer substantial value on the market today. Overloaded with so many extras, it is well placed to accommodate growing families, investors and first home buyers.
The main home offers 3 bedrooms, open plan kitchen/meals/family room, and a secondary multipurpose room.
All the wet areas including the stylish kitchen, bathroom and laundry have been fully renovated.
Great sized bedrooms as well as heating and cooling provided.
Restumping, new flooring and paintwork complement the whole home.
Outside is a fully self-contained bungalow to house the teenager or grand parent of the home, or utilise and take advantage of it as a rental. Sited on a huge (approx.) 1000m2 plus block with various carports, caravan port and huge 6m x 9m shed with concrete floor, power and solar panels that run the home.
Neighbouring crown land and just minutes to Bendigo Central, Bendigo Health and Lake Weeroona. You will not be disappointed.
